verses.verse: Shout <S%H7321><s%> for joy to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> all you lands! <S%H776><s%>
Serve <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with gladness. <S%H8057><s%> Come <S%H935><s%> before his presence <S%H6440><s%> with singing. <S%H7445><s%>

Know <S%H3045><s%> that Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> he is God. <S%H430><s%> It is he who has made <S%H6213><s%> us, <S%H5971><s%> and we are his. We are his people, and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of his pasture. <S%H4830><s%>

Enter <S%H935><s%> into his gates <S%H8179><s%> with thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> into his courts <S%H2691><s%> with praise. <S%H8416><s%> Give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to him, <S%H1288><s%> and bless his name. <S%H8034><s%>
For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is good. <S%H2896><s%> His loving kindness <S%H2896><s%> endures forever, <S%H5769><s%> his faithfulness <S%H530><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>
